title: Bug 14197 - Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Removing a working set immediately causes changes to occur.
OB: When a working set is removed, changes occur without any delay.
EB: When a working set is removed, changes should not occur immediately and there should be a delay.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Verify that the package view is filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set.
